/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy streets. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. The sun shines brightly, illuminating the scene with a warm glow. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and pedestrians add life to the scene, going about their daily routines. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the energy and dynamism of the city.
